price: Sila maaliif qeesonniifi beektonni isaan hin dhorgine?  jechoota isaanii kan badiitiifi wantoota dhorgaman nyaachuu isaanii irraa. Wanti isaan dalagaa turan waa fokkate!
arabic: لَوۡلَا يَنۡهَىٰهُمُ ٱلرَّبَّٰنِيُّونَ وَٱلۡأَحۡبَارُ عَن قَوۡلِهِمُ ٱلۡإِثۡمَ وَأَكۡلِهِمُ ٱلسُّحۡتَۚ لَبِئۡسَ مَا كَانُواْ يَصۡنَعُونَ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: lawlā yanhāhumu al-rabāniyūna wal-aḥbāru ʿan qawlihimu al-ith'ma wa-aklihimu al-suḥ'ta labi'sa mā kānū yaṣnaʿūna
